main event: Mrs. of R R 1 Spring Valley, Ohio observed a bright red glowing unidentified flying object on the morning of 3 September 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as solid, tear drop or pear-shaped., The object was observed descending and then moving upwards before disappearing in the southeast., The sighting lasted for a few seconds to a minute., The object lit up the pasture and house area., The witness requested feedback from the Air Force regarding her sighting.
sighted object: a bright red glowing solid object
